alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Iberville; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 4:53PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Ascension, southeastern Iberville and northwestern Assumption Parishes through 530 PM CDT... At 453 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near White Castle, or 13 miles south of Plaquemine, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Donaldsonville, St. Gabriel, White Castle, Geismar, Bayou Sorrel, Carville and Belle Rose. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
